from sys import stdin

def mod_max(x, y, n):
    return n - ((n - y) % x)
for _ in range(int(stdin.readline().strip())):
    x, y, n = map(int, stdin.readline().strip().split())
    print(mod_max(x, y, n))


from sys import stdin

def mod_max(x,y,n):
    return x*((n-y)//x)  #// is used for integer division

for _ in range(int(stdin.readline().strip())):
    x,y,n=map(int,stdin.readline().strip().split())
    print(mod_max(x,y,n)) #printing the max value

from sys import stdin

def mod_max(x, y, n):
    return n - ((n - y) % x)

for _ in range(int(stdin.readline().strip())):
    x, y, n = map(int, stdin.readline().strip().split())
    print(mod_max(x, y, n))

#!/usr/bin/env python3
t = int(input())
for _ in range(t):
    x, y, n = map(int, input().split())
    print(n - (n % x) + y)

from sys import stdin

def mod_max(x,y,n):
    return x*((n-y)//x)

for _ in range(int(stdin.readline().strip())):
    x,y,n=map(int,stdin.readline().strip().split())
    print(mod_max(x,y,n))
from sys import stdin

def mod_max(x,y,n):
    return n-((n-y)%x) if x>y else y

for _ in range(int(stdin.readline().strip())):
    x,y,n=map(int,stdin.readline().strip().split())
    print(mod_max(x,y,n))
def print_full_name(a, b):
    print("Hello {} {}! You just delved into python.".format(a, b))

for _ in range(int(stdin.readline().strip())):

    print(mod_max(x,y,n))

def mod_max(x, y, n): return n - ((n - y) % x)

for _ in range(int(stdin.readline().strip())): print(mod_max(*map(int, stdin.readline().strip().split())))

from sys import stdin

def mod_max(x,y,n):
    return n - ((n - y) % x)

for _ in range(int(stdin.readline().strip())):
    x, y, n = map(int, stdin.readline().strip().split())
    print(mod_max(x,y,n))
